entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
